de.dfki.oms.webapp

Class HTMLData

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.oms.webapp.HTMLData

  • public class HTMLData
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to convert data from different sources and to HTML documents.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeader

        public static java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String pathCorrection,
                                         java.lang.String loggedInUser,
                                         java.lang.String headerText,
                                         java.lang.String memoryName)
        Retrieves an HTML header with an opened body element.
        Parameters:
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        loggedInUser - Name of the current user.
        headerText - Title to use in the header.
        memoryName - Memory name to use as part of the storage path.
        Returns:
        The HTML document as String.

      • getFooter

        public static java.lang.String getFooter(java.lang.String pathCorrection)
        Retrieves an HTML document containing final remarks and closing body and html tags.
        Parameters:
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        Returns:
        The HTML document as String.

      • getKeyValueAsTable

        public static java.lang.String getKeyValueAsTable(java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String value,
                                                  java.lang.String tableClass,
                                                  java.util.EnumSet<EditStatus> edit)
        Creates an HTML table text containing a key and value in a row.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.
        tableClass - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        edit - Set of allowed edit operations as an EnumSet<EditStatus>.
        Returns:
        The table as an HTML String.

      • getKeyValueAsTableWithHash

        public static java.lang.String getKeyValueAsTableWithHash(java.lang.String key,
                                                          java.lang.String value,
                                                          java.lang.String tableClass,
                                                          java.util.EnumSet<EditStatus> edit,
                                                          java.lang.String hash)
        Creates an HTML table text containing a key and value in a row.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.
        tableClass - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        edit - Set of allowed edit operations as an EnumSet<EditStatus>.
        hash - Hashed type-value-pair. (Use #Hash to hash a String.)
        Returns:
        The table as an HTML String.

      • getKeyValueAsTableWithHash

        public static java.lang.String getKeyValueAsTableWithHash(java.lang.String key,
                                                          java.lang.String value,
                                                          java.lang.String tableClass,
                                                          java.lang.String tableID,
                                                          java.lang.String style,
                                                          java.util.EnumSet<EditStatus> edit,
                                                          java.lang.String hash)
        Creates an HTML table text containing a key and value in a row.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.
        tableClass - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        tableID - ID of the container of the key-value-pair.
        style - Table style.
        edit - Set of allowed edit operations as an EnumSet<EditStatus>.
        hash - Hashed type-value-pair. (Use #Hash to hash a String.)
        Returns:
        The table as an HTML String.

        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.
        tableClass - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        tableID - ID of the container of the key-value-pair.
        style - Table style.
        edit - Set of allowed edit operations as an EnumSet<EditStatus>.
        Returns:
        The table as an HTML String.

        The table as an HTML String.

      • getTilePage

        public static java.lang.String getTilePage(java.lang.String pathCorrection,
                                           java.lang.String caption,
                                           TileStructure structure,
                                           java.lang.String id)
        Creates a complete HTML document containing a header, a table structure and a footer.
        Parameters:
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        caption - The document's headline.
        structure - The document's structure as a TileStructure.
        id - ID that is incremented per table cell.
        Returns:
        The document as an HTML String.

      • getMissingMemoryPage

        public static java.lang.String getMissingMemoryPage(java.lang.String memoryname,
                                                    java.lang.String pathCorrection)
        Creates a complete HTML document containing a header, an error message for a memory that could not be found, and a footer.
        Parameters:
        memoryname - Name of the missing memory.
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        Returns:
        The document as an HTML String.

      • getNoMemoryPage

        public static java.lang.String getNoMemoryPage(java.lang.String error,
                                               java.lang.String pathCorrection,
                                               java.lang.String memoryPath)
        Creates a complete HTML document containing a header, a recovery message for an invalid memory request, and a footer.
        Parameters:
        error - Error text to display.
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        memoryPath - Directory of the OMS's object memories.
        Returns:
        The document as an HTML String.

      • getErrorPage

                                            java.lang.String pathCorrection)
        Creates a complete HTML document containing a header, an error message, and a footer.
        Parameters:
        error - Error text to display.
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        Returns:
        The document as an HTML String.

      • getLoginPage

        public static java.lang.String getLoginPage(java.lang.String memoryName,
                                            java.lang.String pathCorrection)
        Creates a complete HTML document containing a header, a login area, and a footer.
        Parameters:
        memoryName - Name of the memory that needs authentication.
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        Returns:
        The document as an HTML String.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getHTMLAction

        public static java.lang.String getHTMLAction(java.lang.Object obj)
        Creates an HTML snippet that either sets the active window's full URI to a given URL or outpus a message via "alert".
        Parameters:
        obj - The object of action (a URL or a String.
        Returns:
        The snippet as an HTML String.

      • getButton

        public static java.lang.String getButton(java.lang.String editArg,
                                         java.lang.String additionalClass,
                                         java.lang.String innerText,
                                         java.lang.String tooltipText)
        Creates an HTML button text implementing the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        editArg - Type of button ("remove", "add" or "edit").
        additionalClass - Class of the button (unless it is "button").
        innerText - Argument of the button operation.
        tooltipText - What to display as a tooltip text.
        Returns:
        The button as an HTML String.
